title: Psychological Operations (PSYOP) Planning
description: A PSYOP officer must plan a leaflet drop and radio broadcast campaign to encourage enemy soldiers to surrender.

tasks.description: Analyze intelligence on the morale and grievances of the target enemy soldiers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer identifies key themes (e.g., lack of food, poor leadership) that can be exploited.

tasks.description: Develop the content for the leaflets and radio broadcasts, including surrender instructions and promises of safe treatment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates persuasive and culturally appropriate messaging.

tasks.description: Plan the delivery of the messages, including coordinating for aircraft to drop the leaflets and a broadcast aircraft to transmit the radio messages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a detailed execution plan for the PSYOP campaign.
